law.catch_line: This subtitle does not apply to:...
law.text:
This subtitle does not apply to:
a service contract governed by Title 14, Subtitle 4 of the Commercial Law Article that does not include coverage for loss by disappearance or theft;
a policy of insurance covering a seller's or a manufacturer's obligations under a warranty; or
a homeowner's, renter's, private passenger automobile, or similar policy that covers loss or theft of portable electronics.
